members.signatureBeforeChange: public static Configuration loadConfiguration(String aConfigFname,                                                   Properties aOverrideProps)         throws CheckstyleException
members.signatureAfterChange: public static Configuration loadConfiguration(String aConfigFname,                                                   Properties aOverrideProps)         throws CheckstyleException
diff: -            throw new CheckstyleException("unable to find " + aConfigFname);
-            throw new CheckstyleException("unable to parse " + aConfigFname);

+            throw new CheckstyleException("unable to read " + aConfigFname, e);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public static Configuration loadConfiguration(InputSource configSource,         PropertyResolver overridePropsResolver, boolean omitIgnoredModules)         throws CheckstyleException
